chart.name: chart.invoice.per.customer
chart.title: Invoice Per Customer
chart.dataset: select count(*) no_of_invoices , gp.name party_name from gst_invoice gi , gst_party gp where gi.party = gp.id and date(date_invoice) between date(:fromDate) and date(:toDate) and gi.status in ('draft','validated') group by gp.id;

chart.name: chart.invoices.per.category.per.product
chart.title: Invoices Per Category Per Product
chart.dataset: SELECT COUNT(*) no_of_invoices, gp.name product_name, gpc.name product_category from gst_invoice gi, gst_product gp, gst_invoice_line gil, gst_product_category gpc where gil.invoice = gi.id and gil.product = gp.id and gp.category = gpc.id and gi.status in ('paid') and date(date_invoice) between date(:fromDate) and date(:toDate) group by gpc.name, gp.id

chart.name: chart.customer.per.state
chart.title: Customer Per State
chart.dataset:
select count(*) no_of_customers, gs.name state_name from gst_address ga , gst_party gp , gst_state gs , gst_party_address_list gpal where gp.id = gpal.gst_party and gpal.address_list = ga.id
and ga.state = gs.id and gp.customer in ('true') group by gs.id;
